name: Bar Suite
description: Unique suite featuring a built-in bar area perfect for entertaining guests after a round of golf. Generous living space with premium furnishings, custom bar setup, floor-to-ceiling windows with mountain views, and access to the exclusive Concierge Lounge. Features 55-inch HDTV, Bose Wave Radio, and butler service upon request.
shortDescription: Entertainment-ready suite with built-in bar, mountain views, and Concierge access.

meta.title: Bar Suite – Atlantis Reno | Golf The High Sierra
meta.description: Book the Bar Suite at Atlantis Reno – unique suite with built-in bar, mountain views, and concierge services.
